1577000.description:
Popular on Tappytoon, loved by 3.7 million readers,
The Reason Why Raeliana Ended up at the Duke's Mansion. Now with its new side story,
Heika's Colorful Day Out

The story that follows the happy ending with Noah in The Reason Why Raeliana Ended up at the Duke's Mansion. Now the Duke's wife, Raeliana spends her day off outside the mansion with Heika Demint, who calls himself her grandfather. Spend quality time alone with Heika that not even Noah, Wade or anyone else can disturb.

Key Features of Heika's Colorful Day Out


- Enjoy the time spent with the High Priest Heika over the span of 4 episodes.
- Enjoy the illustrations available only in Heika's Colorful Day Out.

Translation into English and Japanese is in process. After the Korean version is released, English and Japanese will be added through a patch update once the translation is complete. Subtitles option under the language setting will also be added through a patch update.
